creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: 3/4 full body profile of little girl in purple patterned kimono wearing white apron and orange and yellow obi; red socks; short, bobbed haircut; grey background
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Design extracted from "Sleighs" (The complete woodblock prints of Yoshida Hiroshi, #92)
title: Little Girl
